detectors.description:
INFONEXTOKEN.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/INFONEXTOKEN.sol#77-82) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/INFONEXTOKEN.sol#79)
